message.body: Doda made like a million meals, all in my spot on the table, hes making more, and he hasnt cleaned up a SINGLE thing. Im just warning you so that i dont get blamed for all his mess
I will deal with him when I get home. Leave him alone and make sure you don't add to the mess yourself.

Ok, but being downstairs alone is disgusting. The floor is covereed with food, all the cutting boards ahve eaten watermelon slices left on them, the sink is filled, the tablecloth is stained mostly in my spot because he used it, and the counter smells rotten
I am going to class now. I will solve the problem tonight.
